page.title: 09CHILDREN'S TETRATHLON
page.content: A very popular hobby is the tetrathlon.This consists of four events_ shooting,swimming,riding and running.In the shooting events a 177 air pistol is usually used. Twelve shots are taken at a target with the best ten counted.Scoring is in multiples of ten up to a maximum hundred for a bull.Swimming consists of swimming as many lengths as possible in a set time.The number of lengths being multiplied by ten for score.Competitors follow a cross country course in the horseriding event. Marks from a thousand being deducted for time faults and refusals. The running is also a cross country course of one 1000 or 1500 metres. A time limit of 5.5 minutes is set.The competitor gaining highest overall marks wins the tetrathlon.
